title: Eval effectiveness-challgs to E. Europe authority

content.question: Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Describe the challenges to royal authority in eastern Europe in the seventeenth and eighteenth centuries and evaluate the effectiveness of those challenges.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Describe the challenges to royal authority in eastern Europe in the seventeenth and eighteenth centuries and evaluate the effectiveness of those challenges.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
